AiEnterpriseInteraction.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all AI enterprise interactions.

LifecycleWorkflows-Workflow.ReadBasic.Al.DisplayName: List all workflows in Lifecycle workflows
LifecycleWorkflows-Workflow.ReadBasic.Al.Description: Allows the app to list all workflows without a signed-in user.

ExternalItem.ReadWrite.OwnedBy.Description: Allows the app to read and write external items without a signed-in user. The app can only read external items of the connection that it is authorized to.

User.Export.All.Description: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).

CallDelegation.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read delegation settings of you

AdministrativeUnit.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

TermStore.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all term store data, without a signed-in user. This includes all sets, groups and terms in the term store.

CustomSecAttributeAssignment.ReadWrite.A.DisplayName: Read and write custom security attribute assignments
CustomSecAttributeAssignment.ReadWrite.A.Description: Allows the app to read and write custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant without a signed in user.

AuditLog.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read and query your audit log activities, without a signed-in user.

HealthMonitoringAlertConfig.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all scenario health monitoring alert configurations
HealthMonitoringAlertConfig.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all scenario health monitoring alert configurations, without a signed-in user.

Device.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's devices' configuration information without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadSelectedForUser.DisplayName: Read selected installed Teams apps for all users
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadSelectedForUser.Description: Allows an app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall selected apps to any user, without a signed-in user.

ConfigurationMonitoring.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all Configuration Monitoring entities
ConfigurationMonitoring.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all Configuration Monitoring entities, without a signed-in user.

IndustryData-OutboundFlow.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write outbound data flows without a signed-in user.

Tasks.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all users’ tasks and tasklists
Tasks.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all users’ tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user

RoleManagementPolicy.Read.Directory.DisplayName: Read all policies for privileged role assignments of your company's directory
RoleManagementPolicy.Read.Directory.Description: Allows the app to read policies for privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, without a signed-in user.

RoleAssignmentSchedule.Read.Directory.DisplayName: Read all active role assignments and role schedules for your company's directory
RoleAssignmentSchedule.Read.Directory.Description: Allows the app to read the active role-based access control (RBAC) assignments and schedules for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes reading directory role templates, and directory roles.

RoleAssignmentSchedule.Remove.Directory.DisplayName: Delete all active role assignments of your company's directory
RoleAssignmentSchedule.Remove.Directory.Description: Delete all active privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, without a signed-in user.

Calls.JoinGroupCallAsGuest.All.DisplayName: Join group calls and meetings as a guest
Calls.JoinGroupCallAsGuest.All.Description: Allows the app to anonymously join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.  The app will be joined as a guest to meetings in your organization.

AuditLogsQuery-Entra.Read.All.DisplayName: Read audit logs data from Entra (Azure AD) workload
AuditLogsQuery-Entra.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read and query audit logs from Entra (Azure AD) workload, without a signed-in user

Mail.ReadWrite.DisplayName: Read and write mail in all mailboxes
Mail.ReadWrite.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

People.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists
People.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read any user's scored list of relevant people, without a signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).

Chat.UpdatePolicyViolation.All.DisplayName: Flag chat messages for violating policy
Chat.UpdatePolicyViolation.All.Description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams 1-to-1 or group chat messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

OrgSettings-AppsAndServices.Read.All.DisplayName: Read organization-wide apps and services settings
OrgSettings-AppsAndServices.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read organization-wide apps and services settings, without a signed-in user.

SecurityIdentitiesHealth.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all identity security health issues
SecurityIdentitiesHealth.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all the identity security health issues without a signed-in user.

ShortNotes.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete all users' short notes
ShortNotes.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete all the short notes without a signed-in user.

MailboxFolder.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all the users' mailbox folders
MailboxFolder.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all the users' mailbox folders, without signed-in user.

EngagementRole.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to assign Viva Engage role to a user, and remove a Viva Engage role from a user without a signed-in user.

ServiceActivity-OneDrive.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all One Drive service activity
ServiceActivity-OneDrive.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all One Drive service activity, without a signed-in user.

BackupRestore-Control.Read.All.DisplayName: Read the status of the M365 backup service
BackupRestore-Control.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the status of M365 backup service (enable/disable), without signed in user

Team.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Get a list of all teams
Team.ReadBasic.All.Description: Get a list of all teams, without a signed-in user.

IndustryData-TimePeriod.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read time period definitions without a signed-in user.

AuditLogsQuery-Exchange.Read.All.DisplayName: Read audit logs data from Exchange workload
AuditLogsQuery-Exchange.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read and query audit logs from Exchange workload, without a signed-in user

RecordsManagement.Read.All.DisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels and policies
RecordsManagement.Read.All.Description: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies without the signed in user.

CrossTenantUserProfileSharing.ReadWrite..DisplayName: Read all shared cross-tenant user profiles and export or delete their data
CrossTenantUserProfileSharing.ReadWrite..Description: Allows the application to list and query any shared user profile information associated with the current tenant without a signed-in user.  It also permits the application to export and remove external user data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), for any user associated with the current tenant without a signed-in user.

MailboxItem.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all the users' mailbox items
MailboxItem.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all the users' mailbox items, without signed-in user.

DeviceManagementScripts.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune Scripts
DeviceManagementScripts.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune device compliance scripts, device management scripts, device shell scripts, device custom attribute shell scripts and device health scripts, without a signed-in user.

CustomTags.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write custom tags data
CustomTags.ReadWrite.All.Description: Read and write custom tags data, without a signed-in user

OnlineMeetingAiInsight.Read.Chat.DisplayName: Read all AI Insights for online meetings where the Teams application is installed.
OnlineMeetingAiInsight.Read.Chat.Description: Allows the teams-app to read all aiInsights for online meetings where the Teams-app is installed, without a signed-in user.

PrivilegedAccess.Read.AzureResources.DisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure resources
PrivilegedAccess.Read.AzureResources.Description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to audit Azure resources in your organization, without a signed-in user.

HealthMonitoringAlert.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all scenario monitoring alerts
HealthMonitoringAlert.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all scenario monitoring alerts, without a signed-in user.

LifecycleWorkflows-CustomExt.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all Lifecycle workflows custom task extensionss
LifecycleWorkflows-CustomExt.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all Lifecycle workflows custom task extensions without a signed-in user.

PrintJob.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read basic information for print jobs
PrintJob.ReadBasic.All.Description: Allows the application to read the metadata of print jobs without a signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.

OnlineMeetings.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read online meeting details in your organization, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedAdminRelationship.Read.All.DisplayName: Read Delegated Admin relationships with customers
DelegatedAdminRelationship.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read details of delegated admin relationships with customers like access details (that includes roles) and the duration as well as specific role assignments to security groups without a signed-in user.

EduCurricula.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all class modules and resources
EduCurricula.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all modules and resources, without a signed-in user.

GroupMember.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all group memberships
GroupMember.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

Chat.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read names and members of all chat threads
Chat.ReadBasic.All.Description: Read names and members of all one-to-one and group chats in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelfForTea.DisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for all teams
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelfForTea.Description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself in any team, without a signed-in user.

Agreement.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all terms of use agreements
Agreement.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements, without a signed in user.

EntitlementManagement.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read access packages and related entitlement management resources without a signed-in user.

IndustryData-ReferenceDefinition.Read.Al.Description: Allows the app to read reference definitions without a signed-in user.

CallEvents.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read call event information for all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForUser.All.DisplayName: Read installed Teams apps for all users
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForUser.All.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

RoleManagement.ReadWrite.CloudPC.DisplayName: Read and write all Cloud PC RBAC settings
RoleManagement.ReadWrite.CloudPC.Description: Allows the app to read and manage the Cloud PC role-based access control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user. This includes reading and managing Cloud PC role definitions and memberships.

Calls.Initiate.All.DisplayName: Initiate outgoing 1 to 1 calls from the app
Calls.Initiate.All.Description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to a single user and transfer calls to users in your organization’s directory, without a signed-in user.

OrgSettings-Todo.Read.All.DisplayName: Read organization-wide Microsoft To Do settings
OrgSettings-Todo.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read organization-wide Microsoft To Do settings, without a signed-in user.

IdentityRiskyServicePrincipal.ReadWrite..DisplayName: Read and write all identity risky service principal information
IdentityRiskyServicePrincipal.ReadWrite..Description: Allows the app to read and update identity risky service principal for your organization, without a signed-in user.

TeamsTab.ReadWriteForChat.All.DisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all chats
TeamsTab.ReadWriteForChat.All.Description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any chat, without a signed-in user.

TeamworkDevice.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allow the app to read and write the management data for Teams devices, without a signed-in user.

IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all risky user information
IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for your organization without a signed-in user.  Update operations include dismissing risky users.

InformationProtectionContent.Write.All.Description: Allows the app to create protected content without a signed-in user.

IndustryData-SourceSystem.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write source system definitions without a signed-in user.

LifecycleWorkflows.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to list and read all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources without a signed-in user.

Organization.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Privilege.DisplayName: Perform user-impacting remote actions on Microsoft Intune devices
DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Privilege.Description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

LifecycleWorkflows-Workflow.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all workflows in Lifecycle workflows
LifecycleWorkflows-Workflow.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to list and read all workflows and tasks without a signed-in user.

Files.SelectedOperations.Selected.DisplayName: Access selected Files without a signed in user.
Files.SelectedOperations.Selected.Description: Allow the application to access a subset of files without a signed in user.  The specific files and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online or OneDrive.

CloudPC.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the properties of Cloud PCs, without a signed-in user.

LifecycleWorkflows.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all lifecycle workflows resources
LifecycleWorkflows.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to create, update, list, read and delete all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources without a signed-in user.

IdentityProvider.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization’s identity (authentication) providers’ properties without a signed in user.

VirtualAppointmentNotification.Send.DisplayName: Send notification regarding virtual appointments as any user
VirtualAppointmentNotification.Send.Description: Allows the application to send notification regarding virtual appointments as any user, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user's data by the online meetings application access policy.

ServiceActivity-Teams.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all Teams service activity, without a signed-in user.

ServiceMessage.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages, without a signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

ThreatHunting.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to run hunting queries, without a signed-in user.

LearningSelfInitiatedCourse.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read data for all self-initiated courses in the organization's directory, without a signed-in user.

Policy.Read.IdentityProtection.DisplayName: Read your organization’s identity protection policy
Policy.Read.IdentityProtection.Description: Allows the app to read your organization’s identity protection policy without a signed-in user.

ConfigurationMonitoring.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all Configuration Monitoring entities, without a signed-in user.

UserAuthMethod-Passkey.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all users' passkey authentication methods
UserAuthMethod-Passkey.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read passkey authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

UserTeamwork.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all user teamwork settings without a signed-in user.

TeamMember.Read.All.DisplayName: Read the members of all teams
TeamMember.Read.All.Description: Read the members of all teams, without a signed-in user.

Sites.Archive.All.DisplayName: Archive/reactivate Site Collections without a signed in user.
Sites.Archive.All.Description: Allow the application to archive/reactivate site collections without a signed in user.

PendingExternalUserProfile.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all pending external user profiles
PendingExternalUserProfile.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read available properties of pending external user profiles, without a signed-in user.

LearningContent.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to manage all learning content in the organization's directory, without a signed-in user.

ThreatSubmission.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all of the organization's threat submissions
ThreatSubmission.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and to view threat submission policies without a signed-in user.

LifecycleWorkflows-Workflow.Activate.DisplayName: Run workflows on-demand in Lifecycle workflows
LifecycleWorkflows-Workflow.Activate.Description: Allows the app run workflows on-demand without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.CrossTenantAccess.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies
Policy.ReadWrite.CrossTenantAccess.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies without a signed-in user.

OrgSettings-Todo.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write organization-wide Microsoft To Do settings
OrgSettings-Todo.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write organization-wide Microsoft To Do settings, without a signed-in user.

eDiscovery.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all eDiscovery objects
eDiscovery.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write eDiscovery objects such as cases, custodians, review sets and other related objects without a signed-in user.

Bookings.Read.All.Description: Allows an app to read Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.DisplayName: Manage installation and permission grants of Teams apps in a user account
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any user account, without a signed-in user. Gives the ability to manage permission grants for accessing those specific users' data.

Chat.ReadWrite.WhereInstalled.DisplayName: Read and write all chat messages for chats where the associated Teams application is installed.
Chat.ReadWrite.WhereInstalled.Description: Allows the app to read and write all chat messages in Microsoft Teams for chats where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.IdentityProtection.DisplayName: Read and write your organization’s identity protection policy
Policy.ReadWrite.IdentityProtection.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization’s identity protection policy without a signed-in user.

ChangeManagement.Read.All.Description: Allows to read all Change Management items.

DeviceTemplate.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all device templates
DeviceTemplate.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete any device template, without a signed-in user. It also allows the app to add or remove owners on any device template.

BackupRestore-Configuration.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all backup configurations, and lists of Microsoft 365 service resources to be backed-up, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForUser.Al.DisplayName: Manage Teams apps for all users
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForUser.Al.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Policy.ReadWrite.DeviceConfiguration.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's device configuration policies
Policy.ReadWrite.DeviceConfiguration.Description: Allows the application to read and write your organization's device configuration policies without a signed-in user.  For example, device registration policy can limit initial provisioning controls using quota restrictions, additional authentication and authorization checks.

NetworkAccessBranch.Read.All.DisplayName: Read properties of all branches for network access
NetworkAccessBranch.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's network access branches, without a signed-in user.

Bookings.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow create, delete and publish of booking businesses.

EduRoster.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read.

NetworkAccessBranch.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write properties of all branches for network access
NetworkAccessBranch.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's network access branches, without a signed-in user.

TeamTemplates.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all available Teams Templates, without a signed-user.

Policy.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed in user.

Schedule.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all schedule items
Schedule.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to manage all schedules, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application without a signed-in user.

RoleManagementAlert.ReadWrite.Directory.DisplayName: Read all alert data, configure alerts, and take actions on all alerts for your company's directory
RoleManagementAlert.ReadWrite.Directory.Description: Allows the app to read and manage all role-based access control (RBAC) alerts for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes managing alert settings, initiating alert scans, dismissing alerts, remediating alert incidents, and reading alert statuses, alert definitions, alert configurations and incidents that lead to an alert.

EduRoster.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read a limited subset of the organization's roster
EduRoster.ReadBasic.All.Description: Allows the app to read a limited subset of properties from both the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users. Includes name, status, role, email address and photo.

ResourceSpecificPermissionGrant.ReadForC.DisplayName: Read resource specific permissions granted on a chat
ResourceSpecificPermissionGrant.ReadForC.Description: Allows the app to read the resource specific permissions granted on the chat without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.DisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself and its permission grants for all chats
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.Description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for any chat, without a signed-in user, and manage its permission grants for accessing those specific chats' data.

Application.ReadWrite.OwnedBy.DisplayName: Manage apps that this app creates or owns
Application.ReadWrite.OwnedBy.Description: Allows the app to create other applications, and fully manage those applications (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any apps that it is not an owner of.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelectedFo.DisplayName: Manage selected installed Teams apps in all teams
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelectedFo.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall selected Teams apps in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

DelegatedAdminRelationship.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Manage Delegated Admin relationships with customers
DelegatedAdminRelationship.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to manage (create-update-terminate) Delegated Admin relationships with customers and role assignments to security groups for active Delegated Admin relationships without a signed-in user.

Channel.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read the names and descriptions  of all channels
Channel.ReadBasic.All.Description: Read all channel names and channel descriptions, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ManageSelectedForCh.DisplayName: Manage installation and permission grants of selected Teams apps in all chats
TeamsAppInstallation.ManageSelectedForCh.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall selected Teams apps in any chat, without a signed-in user. Gives the ability to manage permission grants for accessing those specific chats' data.

OnPremisesPublishingProfiles.ReadWrite.A.Description: Allows the app to create, view, update and delete on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, as part of a hybrid identity configuration, without a signed in user.

IndustryData-ReferenceDefinition.ReadWri.Description: Allows the app to read and write reference definitions without a signed-in user.

User.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
User.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.

Domain.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all domain properties without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.AccessReview.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's directory access review default policy
Policy.ReadWrite.AccessReview.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's directory access review default policy without a signed-in user.

OnPremDirectorySynchronization.ReadWrite.DisplayName: Read and write all on-premises directory synchronization information
OnPremDirectorySynchronization.ReadWrite.Description: Allows the app to read and write all on-premises directory synchronization information for the organization, without a signed-in user.

DeviceManagementCloudCA.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Cloud PKI objects
DeviceManagementCloudCA.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write certification authority information without a signed-in user.

Calendars.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read basic details of calendars in all mailboxes
Calendars.ReadBasic.All.Description: Allows the app to read events of all calendars, except for properties such as body, attachments, and extensions, without a signed-in user.

CallEvents-Emergency.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read emergency call event information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.TrustFramework.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's trust framework policies
Policy.ReadWrite.TrustFramework.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies without a signed in user.

PrintJob.ReadWriteBasic.All.DisplayName: Read and write basic information for print jobs
PrintJob.ReadWriteBasic.All.Description: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs without a signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.

UserAuthenticationMethod.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

PrintJob.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs without a signed-in user.

ExternalItem.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all external items without a signed-in user.

Domain.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all domain properties without a signed in user.  Also allows the app to add,  verify and remove domains.

ConsentRequest.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read consent requests and approvals without a signed-in user.

PartnerSecurity.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read security alerts and update status of security alerts of customer with CSP relationship
PartnerSecurity.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read security alerts and update status of alerts of customer with CSP relationship, without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.Authorization.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's authorization policy
Policy.ReadWrite.Authorization.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's authorization policy without a signed in user. For example, authorization policies can control some of the permissions that the out-of-the-box user role has by default.

UserAuthMethod-Passkey.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all users' passkey authentication methods
UserAuthMethod-Passkey.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the application to read and write passkey authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods

User.Invite.All.DisplayName: Invite guest users to the organization
User.Invite.All.Description: Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, without a signed-in user.

OrgSettings-DynamicsVoice.Read.All.DisplayName: Read organization-wide Dynamics customer voice settings
OrgSettings-DynamicsVoice.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read organization-wide Dynamics customer voice settings, without a signed-in user.

RecordsManagement.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write Records Management configuration, labels and policies
RecordsManagement.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies without the signed in user.

Calls.AccessMedia.All.DisplayName: Access media streams in a call as an app
Calls.AccessMedia.All.Description: Allows the app to get direct access to media streams in a call, without a signed-in user.

Member.Read.Hidden.Description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.

BitlockerKey.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read all BitLocker keys basic information
BitlockerKey.ReadBasic.All.Description: Allows an app to read basic BitLocker key properties for all devices, without a signed-in user. Does not allow read of the recovery key.

User.EnableDisableAccount.All.Description: Allows the app to enable and disable users' accounts, without a signed-in user.

PlaceDevice.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all workplace devices
PlaceDevice.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all workplace devices, without a signed-in user.

Teamwork.Migrate.All.DisplayName: Create chat and channel messages with anyone's identity and with any timestamp
Teamwork.Migrate.All.Description: Allows the app to create chat and channel messages, without a signed in user. The app specifies which user appears as the sender, and can backdate the message to appear as if it was sent long ago. The messages can be sent to any chat or channel in the organization.

ExternalItem.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allow the app to read or write items in all external datasets that the app is authorized to access

EduReports-Reflect.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all tenant reflect check-ins submissions data
EduReports-Reflect.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all tenant users reflect check-ins submissions data without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.FedTokenValidation.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's federated token validation policy
Policy.ReadWrite.FedTokenValidation.Description: Allows the application to read and update the organization's federated token validation policy without a signed-in user.

Calls.JoinGroupCall.All.Description: Allows the app to join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.  The app will be joined with the privileges of a directory user to meetings in your organization.

EduAdministration.Read.All.Description: Read the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.

CustomAuthenticationExtension.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's custom authentication extensions without a signed-in user.

SecurityIdentitiesSensors.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all the identity security sensors without a signed-in user.

TeamworkAppSettings.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams app settings without a signed-in user.

DeviceManagementApps.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

Calendars.Read.Description: Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

TeamworkTag.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write tags in Teams
TeamworkTag.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write tags in Teams without a signed-in user.

Chat.ManageDeletion.All.Description: Allows the app to delete and recover deleted chats, without a signed-in user.

ChatMember.Read.WhereInstalled.DisplayName: Read the members of all chats where the associated Teams application is installed.
ChatMember.Read.WhereInstalled.Description: Allows the app to read the members of all chats where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.Description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for any team, without a signed-in user, and manage its permission grants for accessing those specific teams' data.

NetworkAccessPolicy.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all security and routing policies for network access
NetworkAccessPolicy.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's network access policies, without a signed-in user.

BackupRestore-Search.Read.All.DisplayName: Search for metadata properties in all backup snapshots
BackupRestore-Search.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to search all backup snapshots for Microsoft 365 resources, without a signed-in user.

CallRecord-PstnCalls.Read.All.DisplayName: Read PSTN and direct routing call log data
CallRecord-PstnCalls.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all PSTN and direct routing call log data without a signed-in user.

EduAssignments.ReadWriteBasic.All.DisplayName: Create, read, update and delete all class assignments without grades
EduAssignments.ReadWriteBasic.All.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all class assignments without grades for all users without a signed-in user.

ProfilePhoto.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write profile photo of a user or group
ProfilePhoto.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all profile photos of users and groups, without a signed-in user

MailboxSettings.Read.Description: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

ThreatAssessment.Read.All.Description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests, without a signed-in user.

VirtualAppointment.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read-write all virtual appointments for users, as authorized by online meetings app access policy
VirtualAppointment.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the application to read and write virtual appointments for all users, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user’s data by the online meetings application access policy.

SecurityActions.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read security actions, without a signed-in user.

PrivilegedAssignmentSchedule.Read.AzureA.DisplayName: Read assignment schedules for access to Azure AD groups
PrivilegedAssignmentSchedule.Read.AzureA.Description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment schedules for access to Azure AD groups, without a signed-in user.

EngagementConversation.Migration.All.DisplayName: Read and write all Viva Engage conversations
EngagementConversation.Migration.All.Description: Allows the app to create Viva Engage conversations without a signed-in user.

EventListener.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all authentication event listeners
EventListener.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read or write your organization's authentication event listeners without a signed-in user.

BackupRestore-Restore.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read restore all sessions and start restore sessions from backups
BackupRestore-Restore.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to search all backup snapshots for Microsoft 365 resources, and restore Microsoft 365 resources from a backed-up snapshot, without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's conditional access policies
Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

SynchronizationData-User.Upload.DisplayName: Upload user data to the identity synchronization service
SynchronizationData-User.Upload.Description: Allows the application to upload bulk user data to the identity synchronization service, without a signed-in user.

TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All.Description: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

SecurityIdentitiesHealth.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all identity security health issues
SecurityIdentitiesHealth.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write identity security health issues without a signed-in user.

Notes.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all OneNote notebooks
Notes.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.DisplayName: Manage installation and permission grants of Teams apps for all chats
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteAndConsent.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any chat, without a signed-in user. Gives the ability to manage permission grants for accessing those specific chats' data.

CustomAuthenticationExtension.Receive.Pa.DisplayName: Receive custom authentication extension HTTP requests
CustomAuthenticationExtension.Receive.Pa.Description: Allows custom authentication extensions associated with the app to receive HTTP requests triggered by an authentication event. The request can include information about a user, client and resource service principals, and other information about the authentication.

DeviceManagementScripts.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read Microsoft Intune device compliance scripts, device management scripts, device shell scripts, device custom attribute shell scripts and device health scripts, without a signed-in user.

Group.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read group properties and memberships, and read conversations for all groups, without a signed-in user.

MultiTenantOrganization.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all multi-tenant organization details and tenants
MultiTenantOrganization.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all multi-tenant organization details and tenants, without a signed-in user.

EduCurricula.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all class modules and resources
EduCurricula.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all modules and resources, without a signed-in user.

SearchConfiguration.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read search configurations, without a signed-in user.

User-Phone.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all user mobile phone and business phones
User-Phone.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write the mobile phone and business phones for all users, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ManageSelectedForTe.DisplayName: Manage installation and permission grants of selected Teams apps in all teams
TeamsAppInstallation.ManageSelectedForTe.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall selected Teams apps in any team, without a signed-in user. Gives the ability to manage permission grants for accessing those specific teams' data.

PrivilegedAccess.Read.AzureAD.DisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD roles
PrivilegedAccess.Read.AzureAD.Description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles in your organization, without a signed-in user.

RoleAssignmentSchedule.ReadWrite.Directo.DisplayName: Read, update, and delete all policies for privileged role assignments of your company's directory
RoleAssignmentSchedule.ReadWrite.Directo.Description: Allows the app to read, update, and delete policies for privileged role-based access control (RBAC) assignments of your company's directory, without a signed-in user.

SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and update your organization’s security events
SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events.

Schedule.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all schedules, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.ExternalIdentities.DisplayName: Read and write your organization's external identities policy
Policy.ReadWrite.ExternalIdentities.Description: Allows the application to read and update the organization's external identities policy without a signed-in user.  For example, external identities policy controls if users invited to access resources in your organization via B2B collaboration or B2B direct connect are allowed to self-service leave.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForChat.Al.DisplayName: Manage Teams apps for all chats
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForChat.Al.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any chat, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

FileIngestionHybridOnboarding.Manage.DisplayName: Manage onboarding for a Hybrid Cloud tenant
FileIngestionHybridOnboarding.Manage.Description: Allows the app to manage onboarding for a Hybrid Cloud tenant, without a signed-in user.

Tasks.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all users’ tasks and tasklist
Tasks.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all users’ tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user.

TeamsTab.Create.Description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForChat.All.DisplayName: Read installed Teams apps for all chats
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForChat.All.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed in any chat, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Place.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.

MailboxSettings.ReadWrite.DisplayName: Read and write all user mailbox settings
MailboxSettings.ReadWrite.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationFlows.DisplayName: Read and write authentication flow policies
Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationFlows.Description: Allows the app to read and write all authentication flow policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelfForCha.DisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for all chats
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelfForCha.Description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for any chat, without a signed-in user.

OnPremDirectorySynchronization.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all on-premises directory synchronization information
OnPremDirectorySynchronization.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all on-premises directory synchronization information for the organization, without a signed-in user.

Sites.Read.All.DisplayName: Read items in all site collections
Sites.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

RoleManagementPolicy.Read.AzureADGroup.DisplayName: Read all policies in PIM for Groups
RoleManagementPolicy.Read.AzureADGroup.Description: Allows the app to read policies in Privileged Identity Management for Groups, without a signed-in user.

Sites.Manage.All.DisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections
Sites.Manage.All.Description: Allows the app to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections without a signed in user.

Team.Create.Description: Allows the app to create teams without a signed-in user.

APIConnectors.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write API connectors for authentication flows
APIConnectors.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read, create and manage the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.

ExternalConnection.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all external connections without a signed-in user.

PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureAD.DisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD roles
PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureAD.Description: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles in your organization, without a signed-in user.

CloudApp-Discovery.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all details of discovered cloud apps in the organization, without a signed-in user.

SecurityIdentitiesSensors.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all identity security sensors
SecurityIdentitiesSensors.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write identity security sensors without a signed-in user.

BusinessScenarioData.Read.OwnedBy.DisplayName: Read data for all business scenarios this app creates or owns
BusinessScenarioData.Read.OwnedBy.Description: Allows the app to read the data associated with the business scenarios it owns, without a signed-in user.

MailboxFolder.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all the users' mailbox folders
MailboxFolder.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write all the users' mailbox folders, without signed-in user.

TeamSettings.Read.All.Description: Read all team's settings, without a signed-in user.

VirtualAppointment.Read.All.Description: Allows the application to read virtual appointments for all users, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user’s data by the online meetings application access policy.

Policy.Read.ConditionalAccess.DisplayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies
Policy.Read.ConditionalAccess.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

Chat.Create.Description: Allows the app to create chats without a signed-in user.

DeviceManagementRBAC.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

CustomSecAttributeAssignment.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant without a signed in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationMethod.DisplayName: Read and write all authentication method policies
Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationMethod.Description: Allows the app to read and write all authentication method policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

Channel.Create.Description: Create channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

ApprovalSolution.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all approvals and approval item subscriptions, without a signed-in user.

OrgSettings-AppsAndServices.ReadWrite.Al.DisplayName: Read and write organization-wide apps and services settings
OrgSettings-AppsAndServices.ReadWrite.Al.Description: Allows the app to read and write organization-wide apps and services settings, without a signed-in user.

PublicKeyInfrastructure.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the application to read and write certificate-based authentication configuration such as all public key infrastructures (PKI) and certificate authorities (CA) configured for the organization, without a signed-in user.

BrowserSiteLists.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all browser site lists for your organization
BrowserSiteLists.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows an app to read and write all browser site lists configured for your organization, without a signed-in user.

User.RevokeSessions.All.DisplayName: Revoke all sign in sessions for a user

RiskPreventionProviders.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all identity risk prevention providers
RiskPreventionProviders.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's risk prevention providers, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ManageSelectedForUs.DisplayName: Manage installation and permission grants of selected Teams apps for all user accounts
TeamsAppInstallation.ManageSelectedForUs.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall selected Teams apps in any user account, without a signed-in user. Gives the ability to manage permission grants for accessing those specific users' data.

TeamsTab.ReadWriteForUser.All.DisplayName: Allow the app to manage all tabs for all users
TeamsTab.ReadWriteForUser.All.Description: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any user, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForTeam.Al.DisplayName: Manage Teams apps for all teams
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForTeam.Al.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Synchronization.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all Azure AD synchronization data.
Synchronization.Read.All.Description: Allows the application to read Azure AD synchronization information, without a signed-in user.

LifecycleWorkflows-CustomExt.ReadWrite.A.DisplayName: Read and write all Lifecycle workflows custom task extensions
LifecycleWorkflows-CustomExt.ReadWrite.A.Description: Allows the app to create, update, list, read and delete all Lifecycle workflows custom task extensions without a signed-in user.

CustomSecAttributeProvisioning.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the provisioning configuration of all active custom security attributes without a signed-in user.

BackupRestore-Control.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to update or read the status of M365 backup service (enable/disable), without signed in user

IndustryData-OutboundFlow.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read outbound data flows without a signed-in user.

Policy.ReadWrite.ApplicationConfiguratio.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies, without a signed-in user.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.

AccessReview.ReadWrite.Membership.DisplayName: Manage access reviews for group and app memberships
AccessReview.ReadWrite.Membership.Description: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization for group and app memberships, without a signed-in user.

Application.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

Sites.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections
Sites.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

DeviceLocalCredential.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read device local credential properties including passwords, without a signed-in user.

User.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.

EduAssignments.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all class assignments with grades
EduAssignments.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all class assignments with grades for all users without a signed-in user.

DirectoryRecommendations.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and update all Azure AD recommendations
DirectoryRecommendations.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and update all Azure AD recommendations, without a signed-in user.

ReportSettings.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all admin report settings
ReportSettings.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and update all admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, without a signed-in user.

TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForTeam.All.DisplayName: Read installed Teams apps for all teams
TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForTeam.All.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

ChatMember.ReadWrite.All.Description: Add and remove members from all chats, without a signed-in user.

Sites.Selected.Description: Allow the application to access a subset of site collections without a signed in user.  The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.

DeviceManagementConfiguration.Read.All.DisplayName: Read Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
DeviceManagementConfiguration.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups, without a signed-in user.

ServicePrincipalEndpoint.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and update service principal endpoints
ServicePrincipalEndpoint.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to update service principal endpoints

IdentityUserFlow.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's user flows, without a signed-in user.

SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and update your organization's security actions
SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read or update security actions, without a signed-in user.

HealthMonitoringAlert.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all scenario health monitoring alert
HealthMonitoringAlert.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all scenario health monitoring alerts, without a signed-in user.

DeviceTemplate.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all device templates, without a signed-in user.

EduAssignments.ReadBasic.All.DisplayName: Read all class assignments without grades
EduAssignments.ReadBasic.All.Description: Allows the app to read all class assignments without grades for all users without a signed-in user.

Calendars.ReadWrite.DisplayName: Read and write calendars in all mailboxes
Calendars.ReadWrite.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

ConsentRequest.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all consent requests
ConsentRequest.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read app consent requests and approvals, and deny or approve those requests without a signed-in user.

AuditLogsQuery-Endpoint.Read.All.DisplayName: Read audit logs data from Endpoint Data Loss Prevention workload
AuditLogsQuery-Endpoint.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read and query audit logs from Endpoint Data Loss Prevention workload, without a signed-in user

ChannelMessage.UpdatePolicyViolation.All.Description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams channel messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

Acronym.Read.All.Description: Allows an app to read all acronyms without a signed-in user.

SecurityAnalyzedMessage.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read metadata, detection details, and execute remediation actions on all emails in your organization
SecurityAnalyzedMessage.ReadWrite.All.Description: Read email metadata and security detection details, and execute remediation actions like deleting an email, without a signed-in user.

Bookmark.Read.All.Description: Allows an app to read all bookmarks without a signed-in user.

OrgSettings-Microsoft365Install.ReadWrit.DisplayName: Read and write organization-wide Microsoft 365 apps installation settings
OrgSettings-Microsoft365Install.ReadWrit.Description: Allows the app to read and write organization-wide Microsoft 365 apps installation settings, without a signed-in user.

Group-Conversation.ReadWrite.All.DisplayName: Read and write all group conversations
Group-Conversation.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read and write conversations of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user.

Contacts.Read.Description: Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

APIConnectors.Read.All.DisplayName: Read API connectors for authentication flows
APIConnectors.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.

ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.

LicenseAssignment.ReadWrite.All.Description: Allows an app to manage license assignments for users and groups, without a signed-in user.

SecurityIdentitiesUserActions.Read.All.DisplayName: Read all identity security available user actions
SecurityIdentitiesUserActions.Read.All.Description: Allows the app to read all the identity security available user actions without a signed-in user.

TeamsTab.ReadWriteSelfForChat.All.DisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for all chats
